item.title: The End Is Nigh
item.description: Six years ago, on January 2, 2019, we tagged the 1.0 release of Crunchy Postgres via Automation (then known as Crunchy HA). Originally a set of Ansible roles, the product grew and morphed into the Ansible collection that it is today over the course of fourteen major releases (in the 1.x line) with contributions from a dozen individuals. And now, with the release of 1.15-17 on Mar 7th, the 1.x line is officially on life support as we phase it out and move customers to our 2.x line.
